tasks.label: Docker: Clean & Rebuild
tasks.command: docker-compose down -v && docker system prune -f && docker-compose up --build

tasks.label: Kratos Test
tasks.command: docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d postgres homassy.kratos && sleep 15 && docker-compose logs homassy.kratos 2>&1 | tail -80

tasks.label: Kratos Test 2
tasks.command: docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d postgres homassy.kratos && sleep 15 && docker-compose logs homassy.kratos 2>&1 | tail -50

tasks.label: Kratos Force Rebuild
tasks.command: docker-compose down -v && docker-compose rm -f homassy.kratos && docker-compose up -d postgres && sleep 10 && docker-compose up -d homassy.kratos && sleep 10 && docker-compose logs homassy.kratos 2>&1 | tail -50

tasks.label: Kratos Fresh Start
tasks.command: docker rm -f homassy-kratos 2>/dev/null; docker-compose up -d homassy.kratos && sleep 5 && docker logs homassy-kratos 2>&1 --since 5s | tail -60

tasks.label: Kratos Test 3
tasks.command: docker rm -f homassy-kratos 2>/dev/null; docker-compose up -d homassy.kratos && sleep 8 && docker logs homassy-kratos 2>&1 | tail -30

tasks.label: Kratos Test Final
tasks.command: docker rm -f homassy-kratos 2>/dev/null; docker-compose up -d homassy.kratos && sleep 8 && docker logs homassy-kratos 2>&1 | tail -30

tasks.label: Kratos Final Test
tasks.command: docker rm -f homassy-kratos 2>/dev/null; docker-compose up -d homassy.kratos && sleep 8 && docker logs homassy-kratos 2>&1 | tail -30

tasks.label: Kratos with Migration
tasks.command: docker rm -f homassy-kratos 2>/dev/null; docker-compose up -d homassy.kratos && sleep 15 && docker logs homassy-kratos 2>&1 | tail -40

tasks.label: Kratos Migration v2
tasks.command: docker rm -f homassy-kratos 2>/dev/null; docker-compose up -d homassy.kratos && sleep 15 && docker logs homassy-kratos 2>&1 | tail -40

tasks.label: Kratos Final v3
tasks.command: docker rm -f homassy-kratos 2>/dev/null; docker-compose up -d homassy.kratos && sleep 20 && docker logs homassy-kratos 2>&1 | tail -50

tasks.label: Phase 1 Test 3 - Kratos Tables
tasks.command: docker exec homassy-postgres psql -U postgres -d homassy -c "SELECT table_schema, table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'kratos' ORDER BY table_name LIMIT 20;"

tasks.label: Phase 1 Test 3b - Kratos Tables
tasks.command: docker exec homassy-postgres bash -c "psql -U \$POSTGRES_USER -d \$POSTGRES_DB -c \"SELECT table_schema, table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'kratos' ORDER BY table_name LIMIT 20;\""

tasks.label: Phase 2 Test - Kratos Restart
tasks.command: docker rm -f homassy-kratos 2>/dev/null; docker-compose up -d homassy.kratos && sleep 15 && docker logs homassy-kratos 2>&1 | tail -50

tasks.label: Phase 2 - Health Check
tasks.command: curl -s http://localhost:4433/health/alive | jq && curl -s http://localhost:4433/health/ready | jq

tasks.label: Build Tests v3
tasks.command: dotnet build Homassy.Tests/Homassy.Tests.csproj 2>&1 | grep -E '(error|warning|Build succeeded|Build FAILED)' | tail -30

tasks.label: Full Test Run
tasks.command: dotnet build Homassy.Tests/Homassy.Tests.csproj && cd Homassy.Tests && dotnet test --no-build 2>&1 | tail -20

tasks.label: Show Failed Tests
tasks.command: cd Homassy.Tests && dotnet test --no-build 2>&1 | grep -E '(Failed |Error Message:|Total tests:)' | head -50

tasks.label: Count Tests
tasks.command: cd Homassy.Tests && dotnet test --no-build --list-tests 2>&1 | grep -c 'Test Method'

tasks.label: Clean and Build Tests
tasks.command: cd Homassy.Tests && rm -rf bin obj && dotnet build 2>&1 | tail -10

tasks.label: Clean Build Tests v2
tasks.command: dotnet clean Homassy.Tests/Homassy.Tests.csproj && dotnet build Homassy.Tests/Homassy.Tests.csproj 2>&1 | tail -15

tasks.label: Test Summary
tasks.command: cd Homassy.Tests && dotnet test 2>&1 | grep -E '(^Failed|^Passed|Total tests:|^Test Run|Failed!)' | head -20

tasks.label: Create Migration
tasks.command: cd Homassy.API && dotnet ef migrations add AddKratosIdentityId --context HomassyDbContext 2>&1

tasks.label: Create Migration v2
tasks.command: cd Homassy.API && dotnet ef migrations add AddKratosIdentityId --context HomassyDbContext 2>&1 | tail -30

tasks.label: Build and Run Migrator
tasks.command: docker-compose build homassy.migrator && docker-compose up homassy.migrator 2>&1 | tail -50

tasks.label: Clean and Run Migrator
tasks.command: docker rm -f homassy-migrator 2>/dev/null; docker container prune -f 2>/dev/null; docker-compose up homassy.migrator 2>&1 | tail -30

tasks.label: Health Checks
tasks.command: sleep 15 && docker-compose ps && curl -s http://localhost:5226/health/alive | head -5

tasks.label: API Health
tasks.command:
sleep 20 && curl -s http://localhost:5226/health/alive && echo '
---' && docker logs homassy-api 2>&1 | tail -30

tasks.label: API Health and Logs
tasks.command: curl -s http://localhost:5226/health/alive && echo '' && docker logs homassy-api 2>&1 | tail -40

tasks.label: Rebuild API
tasks.command: docker rm -f homassy-api 2>/dev/null; docker-compose up -d --build homassy.api && sleep 20 && curl -s http://localhost:5226/health/alive | head -20

tasks.label: Force Rebuild
tasks.command: docker rm -f homassy-api homassy-migrator 2>/dev/null; docker-compose build --no-cache homassy.api homassy.migrator 2>&1 | tail -20

tasks.label: Build & Start
tasks.command: docker-compose build --no-cache homassy.api 2>&1 && docker-compose up -d && sleep 30 && docker-compose ps

tasks.label: Check Status
tasks.command: docker-compose ps && curl -s http://localhost:5226/health/alive && echo '' && docker logs homassy-api 2>&1 | tail -20

tasks.label: Wait & Check
tasks.command: sleep 30 && docker-compose ps && echo '---' && curl -s http://localhost:5226/health/alive

tasks.label: Restart API
tasks.command: docker rm -f homassy-api 2>/dev/null; docker-compose up -d homassy.api && sleep 40 && docker-compose ps

tasks.label: Test Auth Endpoints
tasks.command:
echo 'Auth Config:' && curl -s http://localhost:5226/api/v1.0/auth/config | jq && echo '
Auth Me (unauthenticated):' && curl -s http://localhost:5226/api/v1.0/auth/me

tasks.label: Run Tests
tasks.command: cd Homassy.Tests && dotnet test --no-restore --verbosity normal 2>&1 | tail -100

tasks.label: Run Tests v2
tasks.command: cd Homassy.Tests && dotnet test --no-restore --verbosity normal 2>&1 | head -200

tasks.label: Test Single
tasks.command: cd Homassy.Tests && dotnet test --filter "FullyQualifiedName=Homassy.Tests.Unit.UserFunctionsTests.CreateUserAsync_ValidRequest_CreatesUser" --verbosity detailed 2>&1 | tail -100

tasks.label: All Tests v3
tasks.command: cd Homassy.Tests && dotnet test --no-restore --verbosity normal 2>&1 | tail -20

tasks.label: Test Summary
tasks.command: cd Homassy.Tests && dotnet test --no-restore 2>&1 | grep -E '^(Test summary|Passed|Failed|Total tests)'

tasks.label: Test Results
tasks.command: cd Homassy.Tests && dotnet test 2>&1 | grep -E '(Failed|Passed|Total|Test Run)' | tail -10

tasks.label: SelectValue Tests
tasks.command: cd Homassy.Tests && dotnet test --filter "FullyQualifiedName~SelectValueControllerTests" --verbosity normal 2>&1 | tail -80

tasks.label: Final Test Run
tasks.command: cd Homassy.Tests && dotnet test --verbosity normal 2>&1 | grep -E '(Failed|^  Error Message:|^    Expected:)' | head -30

tasks.label: Single Test Debug
tasks.command: cd Homassy.Tests && dotnet test --filter "FullyQualifiedName~SelectValueController.GetSelectValues_ShoppingLocation_ReturnsCreatedLocation" --verbosity detailed 2>&1 | tail -50

tasks.label: Debug Failing Test
tasks.command: cd Homassy.Tests && dotnet test --filter "FullyQualifiedName~UserControllerTests.GetProfile_WithValidToken_ReturnsProfile" --verbosity detailed 2>&1 | tail -70

tasks.label: Suite Summary
tasks.command: cd Homassy.Tests && dotnet test 2>&1 | grep -E '(Failed!|Passed!)' | tail -1

tasks.label: Result
tasks.command: cd Homassy.Tests && dotnet test 2>&1 | grep -E '(- Failed:|~ |Done)' | tail -3

tasks.label: Build Frontend
tasks.command: cd Homassy.Web && npm run build 2>&1 | head -150

tasks.label: Final Build
tasks.command: cd Homassy.Web && npm run build 2>&1 | tail -30

tasks.label: Run All Tests v3
tasks.command: cd /Users/xentinus/Development/Homassy && dotnet test Homassy.Tests/Homassy.Tests.csproj --verbosity normal 2>&1 | tail -50

tasks.label: Show Failed Tests
tasks.command: cd /Users/xentinus/Development/Homassy && dotnet test Homassy.Tests/Homassy.Tests.csproj --verbosity normal --filter "FullyQualifiedName~Failed" 2>&1; echo '---'; dotnet test Homassy.Tests/Homassy.Tests.csproj --verbosity normal 2>&1 | grep -E '(Failed|Error|Exception)' | head -30

tasks.label: Failed Test Details
tasks.command: cd /Users/xentinus/Development/Homassy && dotnet test Homassy.Tests/Homassy.Tests.csproj --verbosity normal --logger "console;verbosity=detailed" 2>&1 | grep -A 20 'Failed '
